messages.content: Hello,Thanks for your query.I have reviewed your case and here is my advice:It looks like you are having symptoms of upper respiratory tract infection with cough as well as other respiratory symptoms. The best course of action would be to use a combination of medications such as:1)A decongestant in the form of an oral tablet or a nasal spray2)An antihistamine3)An antitussive (cough suppressant), such as dextromethorphan4) A cough syrup containing honey and other herbal medicines.I hope this information helps you further.Please don't hesitate to ask if I can be of additional help.
